website_summaries.verdict: Perhaps not the best-looking option, but quite possibly the most versatile.
pros: Expandable size holds just about any loaf
Handy adjustable air vents regulate airflow
Innovative, fuss-free design is perfect for keeping homemade bread fresh
Dishwasher safe, and a great price
cons: Included cutting board is a bit small for larger loaves
Two-piece design can be a hassle to open and close

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Takes up minimum counter space; easy to clean; easy instructions on the venting; plenty of room for a loaf of bread & a little more of something (I had room for some taco shells). Cons: None I was skeptical about something claiming to keep bread fresh. But I don't eat bread very often & end up throwing most of it away which I hate to do as being wasteful & I don't like the taste after freezing bread. But this gizmo is great &
customer_reviews.author: Tea drinker

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for loaves out of a bread maker!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a long time for a "bread box" that would keep my bread maker bread. And this one does the job perfectly. It has a knob to either let some air in or no air in that keeps the bread so moist. And it slides to create the perfect size. Another great feature is it has a built in cutting board. So all you have to do is open and cut without dirtying up dishes.
customer_reviews.author: Ethan&Hannah

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed
customer_reviews.text: I'm not impressed with this product. There's no way it will keep bread fresh since the two parts that slide together fail to include a airtight seam. Air freely moves throughout the container even if you close the end vent, which other reviews confirm the vent doesn't lock in place.
customer_reviews.author: Yvonne K

customer_reviews.title: Amazing bread keeper!! (╹◡╹)♡
customer_reviews.text: I brought the bread keeper because I was tired of wasting a zipbag every week and worrying about mold. This keeper is in amazing good quality! I could not believe it is just 9.90!! Nice plastic, easy to use, keep bread fresh, and well-packed for shipping!! I bake my own bread and it does not raise as high as commercial ones. Please do not give me a hard time...
customer_reviews.author: Philomene

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy unless you want some flying buys inside your kitchen
customer_reviews.text: Literally a useless and worst product I have ever used. Before I bought this product, I just put my bread in the original bag, and the bread can be kept fresh for at least a week and a half. When I started using this product, guess what, it only took THREE DAYS, and there were a lot of flying bugs inside the bread box itself, unbelievable. I always keep my kitchen clean, and I have never had bugs before. Thanks for the help with this product, now I still need to eliminate the extra flying bugs in my kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work.
customer_reviews.text: I put loaf of fresh bread in after it had completely cooled and opened the vent but the inside of the keeper filled with moisture. Also very hard to handle when fully extended for larger loaf. Flimsy, would not recommend..
customer_reviews.author: prairiechic

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work well
customer_reviews.text: This was a great disappointment! I wanted to keep bagels a bit fresher than sitting in a bag. It didn’t work for them. They dried out much faster. It is not made very well- the plug that is supposed to sit in the air vents does not fit well at all so some air is going to get in. Didn’t work for bread either. No good instructions with it.
customer_reviews.author: ronnie

customer_reviews.title: Just okay
customer_reviews.text: I like the idea and it can store homemade bread, however you will have to cut the bread in half at times. It does not air out as good and I don't always like to keep my bread in it for too long. You will have to clean the container from time to time - it can be hard to clean when too much dust collects outside (I am not sure why it is a little sticky). Apparently wiping it isn't going to keep it clean, which is a little disappointing. I was hoping that I can just use my hand to clean the crumbs out rather than washing with water (to avoid mold).
customer_reviews.author: EW

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: This has now made it through it's maiden voyage. It kept the bread soft for 5 days until we finished the loaf and it didn't dry out at all. It is small, and wouldn't keep a loaf of store bought bread but will work for either handmade or machine made homemade bread loaves. You just have to slide it all back together when you are finished cutting the bread, very easy. It is also super easy to clean. Over all, great product if you don't need a bigger loaf of bread. We make 2lb loaves in our machine and it fits.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Bishop

customer_reviews.title: Just about perfect.
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Had been looking for the right container for my 100% whole wheat homemade bread. Perfect size. I was using a Tupperware type cake container before which took up way too much room, especially when refrigerating the bread. Like the venting. I place the cut end opposite from the vent and it results in minimal drying out. The bread board insert doesn't really serve a useful purpose due to size, therefore the reason for 4 stars. Otherwise, I'm very pleased with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Steviesmom

customer_reviews.title: Works great for me!
customer_reviews.text: Being a rookie breadmaker, I had no knowledge of what items I would need to take care of the bread after I finished the process of making it. I quickly found that I did need a place to put the finished product that was easy to use, could allow and/or block air flow, and was transparent. I had been wrapping my bread after each process, but found this to be tedious and a pain to undo and rewrap. So I tried this product and fortunately it was the answer. It was inexpensive, well-made, easy to use and clean, and nice-looking to boot. This works great for me and I highly recommend it to fellow breadmakers!
customer_reviews.author: Retired guy

customer_reviews.title: Love this storage box!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this storage box because I was tired of keeping bread in the plastic bag that it came in. Plastic bags lead to bread becoming moldy. I also started making my own bread during the quarantine... yeah I know, join the team, right?! This works wonderfully for fresh baked bread. We put it in there at the end of the night, after it has completely cooled off. It works great to keep the bread fresh, for as long as it lasts.
customer_reviews.author: Upuha

customer_reviews.title: Best Expandable Bread Keeper
customer_reviews.text: As you know fresh homemade bread can go bad within a few days making it almost impossible to keep. I can't count how many times I had to toss bread into the garbage after only three days. With this keeper that is no longer an issue. Now my bread stays fresh and soft until it is gone. The fact that it is expandable and fits just about any size loaf is a plus, along with the air vent that lets you know whether or not you should keep it open or closed depending upon your climate. It is super easy to clean too.
customer_reviews.author: E. Sloane

customer_reviews.title: Works Great! Well Made. Good Value.
customer_reviews.text: Wow! What a difference this little storage box makes in home made bread storage! I made bread last Monday, and my 7-grain loaf is still usable today. Incredible! I live in a dry climate so I left just the smallest holes open. It worked perfect. Past loafs stored in a thick linen bag were stale by 3 days — plastic bags soft and mushy, or moldy by 3 days. Well constructed simple design. Easy to compress with your loaf usage to optimize counter space. And what a bargain for the price. I’ll never buy store bread again!
customer_reviews.author: MBrew

customer_reviews.title: it is just right.
customer_reviews.text: I bake at least 1 loaf a week and needed storage. This fits a regular loaf exactly. I suggest letting loaf to mostly cool before putting loaf in container. I put a still warm loaf in and even with vent open there was too much moisture. I wiped it down and let next loaf get to just above room temp before closing it up. Some times vent open. Some times not. Your mileage may very. Nice simple set up and I will be getting a second one so for when I do two loaves.
customer_reviews.author: Edd

customer_reviews.title: Not a good buy
customer_reviews.text: This looks good, but is a pain to use. Hard to get bread out without all falling on counter. The air setting part falls off the bread gets hard. Takes up a lot of room and wound up sitting beside the bread on the counter.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good product!
customer_reviews.text: Had my doubts, but this really helps keep our home-based bread fresh longer. Have tried up to 2-lb loaves and all have fit. The adjustable vents allow you to adjust the exposure with changes in temp and humidity, and the included cutting board makes it easy to the cut off slices as needed.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love this bread saver for my homemade bread. I use a bread machine, so the bread always comes out different in height, etc. This saver is very large and adjusts in length to fit most any homemade bread size. There is a learning curve with the air dial to find the perfect amount of air filtration to keep your bread from either molding or drying out too fast and becoming crumbly. But, overall, I would recommend this product. It wouldn’t work for long store bought loafs of bread.
customer_reviews.author: JMS

customer_reviews.title: Best thing I've purchased for my bread-baking!
customer_reviews.text: This bread keeper is amazing.....keeps homemade bread fresh for over a week in Southern California summer! Nice size to keep large loaves, and collapses down as the loaf gets smaller. So glad I purchased this, only wished I had done it years ago. Also easy to clean and looks good on the kitchen counter.
customer_reviews.author: S. Timmons

customer_reviews.title: Well Made and Transparent makes it easy to keep tabs on baked goods
customer_reviews.text: I like that it is transparent and adjustable. It has a dial so you can control moisture....Could work a little better since home baked bread doesn't use preservatives....so does not keep as fresh as I would like. My solution is to use a plastic bag, place in the keeper and place in the refrigerator.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Ishizaki

customer_reviews.title: Pleased with this purchase!
customer_reviews.text: I frequently make different kinds of bread, and this keeper is large enough in length, width, and height to store a single loaf of whatever I make. It’s clear and durable with a good venting system to keep the bread moist. Also, it collapses down as your loaf becomes smaller. It has a small cutting board as a base so that you can cut right on it without making a mess. I’m very happy I chose this one over the others available on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Dorothy Stovall

customer_reviews.title: The Perfect little Breadbox!
customer_reviews.text: While it won't hold a long Italian or French bread, it holds bread I've made in my bread machine. Good also for rolls, croissants, cupcakes, banana bread, etc. It has a dial to regulate air and a neat little breadboard for slicing. It is sturdy and has a smaller footprint on your counter. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Flo L.

customer_reviews.title: Fresh bread
customer_reviews.text: This thing works great. It keeps a loaf of bread fresh for a long time, and I mean a long time. I don't know why it works so well, but it keeps it fresh for 3-4-5 times longer than if you just kept it on the counter. I wish it was just a tad longer, because a full loaf barely fits (but it does) Well worth the price because you won't end up with stale or moldy bread. Buy one for yourself, and buy one for your mother in law. She'll love you for it.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis Downes

customer_reviews.title: Good but not bug-proof
customer_reviews.text: I like this bread box because most loaves from my bread machine fit in it. Also, it’s nice to be able to change the size depending on how much bread you have, so that you aren’t wasting pantry space. However, even with the vent closed, gnats manage to get in during the summer. I am battling gnats all summer, so this is a big issue. If you don’t have a gnat problem you would probably like this.
customer_reviews.author: Amee

customer_reviews.title: Think Into the Box
customer_reviews.text: Yes, a must for bakers of bread loaves. But the real benefit of this humble kitchen gadget is its perfection as a banana ripening chamber. Avocados, as well. No more enduring the first-world shame of that paper bag sitting atop the fridge.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle

customer_reviews.title: This is great!
customer_reviews.text: Im using this for my homemade bread maker loaves. It is a little tight as my bread raises very high, but I just turn the loaf and it fits fine. Just wait til the bread is cool before you close it up. Condensation appears even with the air vent open if the bead is warm.
customer_reviews.author: Robin Balgeman

customer_reviews.title: Adjustable vent is perfect!  This thing really works!
customer_reviews.text: Wow, this really works! I thought airtight was what I needed all the time for storing bread, but turns out this is not true! The ability to open/close/adjust the vent is fabulous. Totally worth the expense & counter space!
customer_reviews.author: OptimalAnimals

customer_reviews.title: I will change stars if I can find out how this thing works.
customer_reviews.text: I will change stars if I can find out how this thing works. I certainly know how it works but the packaging is incredibly over done. I guess it’s made for a big burly men to use and not average sized women. Absolutely ridiculous packaging! It might work perfectly well but I would definitely not buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Echo

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, fails at keeping bread soft.
customer_reviews.text: My problem wasn't the quality of the product, but the fact that it did not keep our bread from going stale. I only used it a couple times then went back to my ziplock bags.
customer_reviews.author: Angie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for bread maker
customer_reviews.text: Great for bread machine. Sometimes bread top bigger than hole. But not often. Have to wait till fully cool to put in or steamy in there. 1 night vents open than vent closed. Well designed and control humidity better than just a bag after fresh.. afraid to put in dishwasher..
customer_reviews.author: Kilu

customer_reviews.title: Fresh bread!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve started baking my own bread (who hasn’t?) and I didn’t like putting it in a plastic bag so I ordered this. I’m pleasantly surprised! It keeps the bread fresh and it doesn’t get moldy. Happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Hognfrog

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: I had been looking for a bread keeper for awhile, anything I found was either too large or was just a place to store bread, not to keep it fresh. This product kept homemade bread and rolls fresh for days longer than if I had wrapped them. Easy to store and easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: VLH

customer_reviews.title: ... purchased a bread machine and had to have a sweet spot to keep my funny shaped loaves of bread
customer_reviews.text: I purchased a bread machine and had to have a sweet spot to keep my funny shaped loaves of bread. I love that it's clear, I love the cutting board that the bread sits on and I'm amazed that the bread doesn't get stale. I thought exposure to air would make the bread dry but some scientific miracle (to me it is a miracle!) keeps the bread fresh. It expands for larger loaves and then you push it together like an accordion as you eat away at your loaf of bread.
customer_reviews.author: Molly P.

customer_reviews.title: Not as expected...maybe warm climate is the problem?
customer_reviews.text: Was ultimately disappointed in this product. Maybe it’s because I live in a warmer climate but I left a loaf in there and it dried up and didn’t preserve freshness. Guess I’m just going to keep putting my loafs in the fridge
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking and functional
customer_reviews.text: Finally, a bread holder that can take the size of my horizontal bread maker loaves. Easily takes my 2 pound horizontal bread maker loaves. Opening and closing is easy. One end of the storage unit has an adjustable air vent to help with controlling air flow into and out of the unit. It would be nice if the other end had one as well to allow for better cross ventilation. I found that even leaving the vent fully opened, my bread still stays somewhat moist even with the low humidity (10 to 15%) we tend to have here in the high altitude of the Colorado Mountains.
customer_reviews.author: T. E. Kainz

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for fresh bread
customer_reviews.text: I started getting into using my bread maker more and wanted to keep the bread longer. This product really works! I am able to keep it fresh for at least 1-2 days longer. Without any preservatives you wont get much longer than that. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Dove Family

customer_reviews.title: IT KEEPS MY BREAD FRESH!!!
customer_reviews.text: I THINK MY CAPSLOCK IS STUCK. OR MAYBE I'M JUST REALLY EXCITED BY THIS PRODUCT. YOU BE THE JUDGE! EVEN MY FINELY CRAFTED HOMEMADE BREADS WILL LAST UP TO A WEEK OR MORE WHEN STORED IN THIS PRODUCT. NO MOLD HERE, MAN! GET LOST SPORES, YOU ARE NOT A FUN-GUY! QUICK AND EASY CLEAN UP. FITS IN MY DISHWASHER, THAT COUNTS AS EASY CLEANUP FOR ME! EASILY FITS LARGE LOAVES UP TO 7 INCHES SQUARE AND NEARLY A FOOT LONG.
customer_reviews.author: E. J. W.

customer_reviews.title: Really extends bread life
customer_reviews.text: My husband says this is the best purchase we've made since buying our bread machine. In a bag our bread would stay fresh for about three days before getting moldy. I would have to freeze half of the loaf right after baking. With this container a loaf will last a week (helps maintain moisture without locking moisture in and encouraging mold). The cutting board is convenient too. And for only $10? Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My bread box is the best!
customer_reviews.text: This bread box is absolutely great. Keeps my bread fresh thru a whole loaf! Easy to operate and has a air adjustment from closed to various openings. Have not used a bread box for a great number of years, however, this is not your grandmothers bread box.
customer_reviews.author: Em Granosky

customer_reviews.title: Awkward to use. Too small.
customer_reviews.text: I found this bread box awkward to use. To get the bread in and out, it is necessary to pull the box apart. With normal bread boxes, you must simply open a wide door, which is much easier. There should be enough space for a loaf of bread and perhaps a few muffins, etc. There is only enough space for a single loaf with this product. Not worth even the low price.
customer_reviews.author: af

customer_reviews.title: Great Little Bread Keeper!
customer_reviews.text: I love the size as it's perfect for about half a loaf, and the other half I keep in my freezer until I am ready to use it. The bread box keeps my slices nice and soft and fresh, and the size is perfect for storing in my pantry or a cabinet.
customer_reviews.author: Tessra P.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a loaf of bread
customer_reviews.text: Even though this is plastic, which I normally don't like, it does the job of keeping a loaf of bread covered and fresh without having to use a bunch of saran wrap. Nice feature with the cutting board and the adjustable vent allows just the right amount of ventilation for the type of baked product your are storing. Perfect for not over crowding your counter top space and since it is clear blends in nicely with any decor.
customer_reviews.author: Lee

customer_reviews.title: Excellent. Get it.
customer_reviews.text: Oh. This thing is awesome. Myneighbor got so jealous that she wanted to know where I bought it. The bread stays fresher than ever before, and it looks pretty cool. The little handy cutting board inside of it is so cute and is washable. Love this thing and the fact that I can shrink it when the bread count gets low. So many people ask me where I got it from. Well, Amazon, of course. Prep Solutions, this is a pretty good buy. Thank you sooooo much.
customer_reviews.author: R. Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: It keeps my daughter's cat from messing with my loaves of bread. I leave it open as much as I can until the loaf cools off and then wipe out the condensation a couple of times with a paper towel until the loaf cools and dries.
customer_reviews.author: Ben Hanes

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality but too small.
customer_reviews.text: I love this breadbox but was very disappointed by the size. It wont fit say a large size of Wonder bread only a smaller loaf. I'm keeping it because it does work well and it looks really nice.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald W.

customer_reviews.title: Good for bread machine loaves
customer_reviews.text: Does the job well. Would buy again. A little cumbersome to use since you have to slide-separate the two pieces of the box to get to your loaf. But the two pieces slide apart/together easily -- it is a good fit. Unpacking was a real challenge because the sliding pieces were wedged tightly together with plastic wrap filling the small space between. Our bread machine makes a tall loaf (7.5") and is a tight fit inside this bread box, but it works. Overall a nice item and well worth the $14 paid.
customer_reviews.author: JimG

customer_reviews.title: Broken on arrival
customer_reviews.text: It was wrapped well, but it's cracked in three places on the bottom. I will be returning and I won't repurchase. The quality doesn't seem all that good. I fiddled with the knob and I can tell it will give me issues.
customer_reviews.author: JS

customer_reviews.title: Cutting board is small. Either a half loaf size or one mini loaf size
customer_reviews.text: I love this product, it looks sleek and does a great job keeping our cut bread fresh. If my bread rises to large it is a tight fit. With my mini loaf pans they fit right in the cutting board. (The cutting board is smaller) this is saving a lot of hassel and money not using bags or wrap.
customer_reviews.author: Markie

customer_reviews.title: Damn near perfect
customer_reviews.text: This container does exactly what I hoped for and worked as advertised. However I started to buy another yesterday and Amazon was out, apparently forever. 😥
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Well worth it
customer_reviews.text: I was really surprised by this product. I bought it to help keep my homemade bread (since it won’t stay fresh as long as store bought). It does a really good job and the moisture adjustment is a great feature. It won’t make your bread taste like it’s fresh out of the oven, but it keeps it well enough that you just have to toast 1-3 day old bread to get it back to original.
customer_reviews.author: rycb

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I never knew a bread box was the best way to store bread. Apparently, it is. I use this for loaves from my bread machine and even the 2 lb. loaves fit well. Freshness is maintained nicely, and I've never had mold develop, even though one loaf sometimes lasts me 2 weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Greg B.

customer_reviews.title: Too BIG
customer_reviews.text: This would be great for someone who bakes giant loafs of bread. Too big for store bought bread. Takes up more space than I want to give up for a loaf of bread in the fridge. I threw it away.
customer_reviews.author: Dianne

customer_reviews.title: Not a great idea
customer_reviews.text: Thought this was a good idea but my bread molded faster than before. I had the humidity closed but it really didnt work for me. I probably should have returned it.
customer_reviews.author: A. Jastrem

customer_reviews.title: Very useful. Large enough for regular bread size and small ...
customer_reviews.text: Very useful. Large enough for regular bread size and small enough to sit quietly on the kitchen counter. It works well with this slicer below as it fits into the container. I put my bread into the slicer and then put the slicer into the container to save space. I'm not using the cutting board that came with the container .
customer_reviews.author: Kaz

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to give this a try Worthless Did not keep things fresh for much longer at all Broke fast Literally broke a day after my return window
customer_reviews.author: Makeup101

customer_reviews.title: A good product, not quite there yet though.
customer_reviews.text: I like this, I love how it is adjustable for loaf size and it includes a cutting board. The issues I have with it are that the seam between the two halves does not seal (the plastic is too thin) so air and insects can freely enter here. Also, the vent itself, a great idea, but it needs a mesh screen behind the holes because fruit flies and fungus gnats can freely pass right through the large holes. There is nothing that ruins the image of freshly baked bread than seeing gnats flying around in your "sealed" bread box as your bread cools.
customer_reviews.author: Limited 10

customer_reviews.title: Cute size
customer_reviews.text: Although this bread box is cute and looks good on my counter I am a little disappointed in it. When I placed a warm loaf of bread in it the steam didn’t escape it formed water droplets in it, even with the steam escape hole opened.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonCustomer

customer_reviews.title: Too big..
customer_reviews.text: Was looking for something to fit a regular sized loaf. But this is too big, too bulky and not looking good for a small spaced pantry. Had to return!
customer_reviews.author: Donnalyn

customer_reviews.title: It keeps your bread soft
customer_reviews.text: Bread keeper does as its name implies and does it well. I have kept bread without preservatives as long as 3 days. I can't say if bread will keep longer because our loaves rarely last that long before being eaten.
customer_reviews.author: JPSlick

customer_reviews.title: breadkeeper
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my homemade bread machine bread. It is tall enough for homemade bread. Previously I was not able to use regular bread keepers for my homemade bread. This one is tall enough, I would have preferred if it wasn't so wide but it isn't too big. It closes
customer_reviews.author: Lori

customer_reviews.title: Great for homemade bread!
customer_reviews.text: This was a great buy for us. My wife has recently started baking her own bread, and we needed a container that would help keep the bread fresh until we could finish eating it. This item has performed very well for us. The only negative aspect that I have had thus far is the way it separates in the middle can make it difficult to handle a fairly full loaf of bread without spilling crumbs all over. As the bread loaf gets smaller, it becomes more manageable. However, it still does a great job and was well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Alan

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for bread machine loaves. Keeps them in sight and easy-to-access so we eat the fresh and delicious bread quickly. The cutting board is a great touch for the lazy young men in my house.
customer_reviews.author: Starligh06

customer_reviews.title: Yes.
customer_reviews.text: So glad I saw this thing. I was using some other weird thing I had laying around the kitchen to store my bread. This is so much better. It's the right size and the materials seem good so far. Glad they have the adjustable vent at the back because I need that for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to use
customer_reviews.text: Difficult to get the bread out, good quality but have to take the front piece out from the back half to get anything out, I ended up buying one that has a fold down front.
customer_reviews.author: Grapes

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my loaves.
customer_reviews.text: This product was very well packaged and arrived in excellent condition. And it is the perfect size for the loaves that come out of my bread makers. Keeps my bread fresh and my crusts crunchy. And it helps a great deal in cutting my loaves. I love it. I recommend this product to anyone and everyone.
customer_reviews.author: Frank

customer_reviews.title: Convenient container, works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my bread machine loaves. We are in a very humid area and storing the loaves in this container as we eat through them each week has managed to keep them from molding. (They do get mold if we don't eat them by day 8 or 9.) This is easy to use, the little cutting board inside is a convenient bonus, and the grippy feet keep it from sliding around the counter when you're trying to use it. I like that it shrinks down as we eat the bread because it takes up less space on the counter.
customer_reviews.author: D. J. Parker

customer_reviews.title: Attractive, compact and useful
customer_reviews.text: Our bread machine makes rather large 2-lb loaves, and we have very limited counter space in our kitchen. We also have two cats who stay off the counters when we're watching, but who can't be expected to stay away from fresh bread left out in the open. The bread boxes I've had in the past have either been too big or too tight for fresh bread, making it soggy. The little side vents on this bread box are the perfect solution, and the telescoping design solves the space problem, too. The little cutting board inside was a big plus. Great price. It's perfect for our needs.
customer_reviews.author: C. Brick

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect
customer_reviews.text: The rotating piece keeps popping off, and while it just pops back on, the plastic tabs that hold it in place will wear out eventually, I imagine
customer_reviews.author: Mark Doner

customer_reviews.title: Good for a few years
customer_reviews.text: I've had this bread box for 3-4 years. As a small apartment dweller it was a great space saver. It could be tucked away when not in use for homemade bread. My only compliant at the beginning was that it isn't wide so storing anything a little beyond a pullman loaf is out of the question. Recently, I've noticed that there is a slight, plastic-like scent/taste to my breads after a night or two in the container. This is after many years of use and it is plastic, so I am not surprised.
customer_reviews.author: XiaoHwa Ng

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your time
customer_reviews.text: It did not keep the bread fresh. It was hard to open and close and just awkward to use in general. I would definitely NOT recommend buying this. Save your money.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Watts

customer_reviews.title: very inconvenient
customer_reviews.text: It was difficult to open it at first. Then the capacity is completely different from the introduction, so it is very inconvenient.
customer_reviews.author: Shelly

customer_reviews.title: Packaging
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product but the plastic covering is jammed in between the two boxes way too tight. I tried for over an hour with various knives and a scissors and could not budge any thing!
customer_reviews.author: edwin r.

customer_reviews.title: Works Great!
customer_reviews.text: This bread keeper does the job just fine. I have put several homemade boules in there and they fit just fine, of course, after we take a couple of "tasting" slices off the end. Don't all home bread bakers do that anyway? Really like that it has a vent because I like to let a little air in to keep my crusts nice and snappy. The bread doesn't stay in there for more than 3-4 days anyway. I would love if they would make another version that is a little taller and longer for those really big, homemade loaves. ---No more looking for plastic bags to store my breads.
customer_reviews.author: Karen S. Eugenio

customer_reviews.title: I love baking bread but I don't know where to put ...
customer_reviews.text: I love baking bread but I don't know where to put them coz it gets stale and hard if I just put them in a bread box without putting them in a ziplock first, so I try to find a bread keeper, and I found this. It was heaven sent and exactly what I was looking for, It keeps my bread fresh for a few days and it doesn't gets hard.
customer_reviews.author: Dixie

customer_reviews.title: Love these
customer_reviews.text: I have been making bread for my husband since he is extremely limited on salt, and I have a recipe for salt-free bread. We were using old bread wrappers, but the bread stayed too moist and became moldy fast. I also make bread for myself, and I like a very "crusty" bread. The option of how much air to allow into the box makes this suitable for both of us (I bought two and marked one with masking tape as mine). To preserve my husband's bread even better, I put this box in the refrigerator during the summer months.
customer_reviews.author: pawestiegirl

customer_reviews.title: Good but just a bit too small for our bread.
customer_reviews.text: Definitely keeps fresh loaves of bread soft. It's just a little too small for the bread made from our bread maker, so we have to turn the bread sideways and it has to be compressed to fit in the container. It needs to be washed in order for any crumb bits and pieces of bread to avoid getting moldy inside. A better option than having the bread grow very crusty and hard. I'm pleased with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Team c

customer_reviews.title: You can see what is in it !
customer_reviews.text: Versatile container. Being able to see what is in it is a big plus. Nice and clear, easy to pull in and out (and wash). May get another one for fruit/veggies.
customer_reviews.author: Willow

customer_reviews.title: Very goog product.
customer_reviews.text: We had Expandable Bread Keeper with Adjustable Air Vent for almost 10 years and we droped on the floor and it broke. We have been so happy that we have found again the same Expandable Bread Keeper with Adjustable Air Vent.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Love this item
customer_reviews.text: I love these. It's amazing how well they keep bread fresh. I use mine to store the bread I make in the bread machine. When I kept the bread in bags, it molded within a couple days. If kept in the fridge, it wasn't fresh and good. These bread keepers are honestly awesome. I highly recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Penny H Sauer

customer_reviews.title: Winner!
customer_reviews.text: This bread box is great--stylish, with adjustable size, and (most importantly) it keeps my bread from going moldy or stale! I actually keep the box on its side, because I buy sliced bread, this way slices don't tumble out when I pull the box open. It keeps the bread fresh better than fridge or plastic baggies. It is smaller than conventional bread boxes, and you can adjust the size to fit your bread by simply pulling the sides further apart. I also really like that it can be washed in a dishwasher.
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: The best companion for your bread machine.
customer_reviews.text: I make a loaf every couple days and the bread stays so nice and fresh in this container. My sister had one and recommended I buy one with my new bread machine. I didn't have high expectations simply because it is plastic and I don't care for plastic bread boxes, but this isn't your ordinary bread box and it just works very well to keep the bread for a few days.
customer_reviews.author: Ms Wilde

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for bread machine bread.
customer_reviews.text: This works great for bread machine bread. I needed a good solution for storing it besides ziplock bags and this works very well. Keeps the bread fresh.
customer_reviews.author: Alisha

customer_reviews.title: I put a loaf of bread store bought and it didn't fit. It is smaller than I thought .
customer_reviews.text: IT is awkward to get the bread out since it opens in the middle .it would be better if you could open it from the front.
customer_reviews.author: Zasarret

customer_reviews.title: Good for gluten free bread
customer_reviews.text: They say not use in fridge, but gluten free bread has to be stored in the fridge. So I do and it works great. I can adjust the opening so that the bread can let out some moisture but still be protected from too much drying. Also it expands and collapses, potentially saving room in the fridge. The cutting board inside is something I didn't think I would use but I do use it every day.
customer_reviews.author: RoseV

customer_reviews.title: bread maker
customer_reviews.text: I was a little skeptical about how this bread box would work with my homemade breads, but decided to give it a try. I am very please to report that it works great. It keeps my bread fresh for a week, whereas before the bread would start to go stale after a couple of days (I had it wrapped in wax paper). It is the right height, width and depth for the breads from my bread machine. Right now I have 1/2 loaf of 9 grain and 1/2 loaf of banana bread in the box. I have no complaints and would recommend this bread keeper.
customer_reviews.author: kindle reader

customer_reviews.title: Fits my GIANT 2 lb loafs!
customer_reviews.text: Fits my giant 2 lb loafs albeit on their side till cut into. Adjustable and the board on the inside is a nice touch.
customer_reviews.author: Natasha H.

customer_reviews.title: noy good for natural breads
customer_reviews.text: I found that all natural breads don't do well, they mold fast, the regular Pepperidge Farm I get for my grandson does fine, no mold, stays fresh
customer_reviews.author: Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Right concept
customer_reviews.text: Concept ok. Design flawed. Wont fit a large loaf. Should open on end so bread wont fall out! Might work if one end opened up
customer_reviews.author: debra roberson

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: This actually spoiled my bread faster. Not able to hold a regular size Loaf a bread a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: juanitabutler2

customer_reviews.title: Unicorn Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I needed to keep homemade bread fresh. Bread does not get stale. Easy to clean and the cutting board is invaluable. It's awesome to be able to look through the outside without opening it and see how much bread you have left.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia S.

customer_reviews.title: Two Items recommended are not compatible
customer_reviews.text: Bread box appears to be okay but it was a recommended purchase with Amyhome Bread Slicer Cutting Guide. Unfortunately, the slicer does not fit inside the bread box. My old unit was most convenient as bread could be stored in the box with the Cutting guide. I did measure to make sure the dimensions would work but because of the sloping corners it does not fit. Very annoying.
customer_reviews.author: Karen S Hamlin

customer_reviews.title: Good adjustable Breadkeeper
customer_reviews.text: This is a good adjustable bread keeper. I've stuffed everything from bagels, to croissants, to yeast rolls, to bread baked in my breadmaker in this bread keeper. I like that it has a vent on the side if you need it. The only issue I have is that you cannot put it in the dishwasher--but most clear plastics don't go in the dishwasher, so I knew that when I bought it. It adjusts to twice the width you see in the picture, but the white base doesn't. It's exactly what I ordered, no surprises or disappointments. I like it, and would buy another.
customer_reviews.author: Vrisi1

customer_reviews.title: Works as expected
customer_reviews.text: This works great to store a load of bread machine bread. It easily fits my 1.5 lb loaves although one bread did need to be smushed just the tiniest bit on the top to squeeze in. The cutting board is a great addition. I wish it came with a way to hold a bread knife, and maybe the knife too.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Potter

customer_reviews.title: Works great, fits in my cabinet and adjust to size ...
customer_reviews.text: Works great, fits in my cabinet and adjust to size of bread. Really like that it is clear so I can see the bread and know that it is still fresh and not starting to mold. Also, the venting is adjustable and that helps keep the homemade bread fresher for a longer period.
customer_reviews.author: Ellen R

customer_reviews.title: We are in FL and the bread used to go bad in about 2 days but with this it lasts ...
customer_reviews.text: Did not cost a lot but has saved us a ton of money. We are in FL and the bread used to go bad in about 2 days but with this it lasts all week. Makes it worth making homemade bananna bread now that we can keep it fresh. Highly reccommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: GchanMako

customer_reviews.title: Simple and Effective
customer_reviews.text: So simple, yet it works so well. Bread stays fresh for days and as you eat it, the size of the storage shrinks. Because it is clear, you can see the bread, how novel! Anyway, price is great and it does exact what is needed, especially when I make a loaf using my bread machine.
customer_reviews.author: CrankinSteve

customer_reviews.title: Great product but has limitations
customer_reviews.text: I will say this bread box is really good but keeps my bread fresh only 2 days before it starts to taste like store bought quality. The other thing, would recommend getting a screen where air vent is to keep fruit flies out. After I remove my bread from machine, I have to let it cool off completely or else I get condensation even with vent fully open. As far as cutting board, I don't use that at all because it is useless. I bought a cherry one from this site. For the price pretty decent and if I had to do it again I would buy it
customer_reviews.author: John Doe

customer_reviews.title: Gonna buy one next for my mother.
customer_reviews.text: This is great for homemade bread storage as it allows moister to exit through ventilation holes.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Derrig-Knight

customer_reviews.title: Perfect storage for homemade breads
customer_reviews.text: I didn't want to store our homemade bread in zip lock bags and spent some time searching for the perfect breadbox. I love how it contracts as the loaves get smaller when the bread gets eaten. I couldn't ask for more!
customer_reviews.author: Jeanne

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised and fits large loaves
customer_reviews.text: I have used this bread box for a few weeks and like it just fine. It replaced large bread bags (the kind that are supposed to keep bread fresh) but I got tired of buying more and more bags. I have a Zojirushi bread maker and this box holds a 2lb loaf easily. I haven't experimented much with the vent hole adjustment. I leave it open 1/2-1 hole and the bread has never molded or dried out. I never used the little cutting board so ended up taking it out.
customer_reviews.author: C. Berend

product_meta.title: Prep Solutions by Progressive Expandable Bread Keeper with Adjustable Air Vent
product_meta.description:
Keep bread, bagels, muffins, and other baked good fresh longer with this innovative adjustable bread keeper from Progressive International, which expands up to 11 inches to fit the size of your bread products. The bread keeper's air vents adjust to allow just the right amount of air into the storage area, and it comes with its own bread board for convenient slicing. Made of polyethylene/polystyrene/TPE, it's dishwasher safe.

Adjustable vent regulates air flow. Durable polypropylene cutting board . Expands up to 11 inches. 

ABOUT PROGRESSIVE INTERNATIONAL
After 38 years in business, Progressive International is still dedicated to creating functional gadgets, tools, food-prep items and household products to make your cooking and meal preparation more efficient and fun. Located in Kent, Washington, Progressive's products are sold in the United States, Canada, Europe, South America, and other international markets.

PROGRESSIVE MAKES COOKING COOL
More than a workspace, the contemporary kitchen is the heart of the home where we connect with family and friends, and Progressive's philosophy of product design aims to create the perfect balance of form, function and value for your kitchen. The design process pulls from many different research methods such as ethnographic research, consumer testing, surveys, and in-home observations, identifying real life problems in the kitchen that translate to fresh, new ideas for smarter products.
feature_bullets: EXPANDABLE BREAD KEEPER: Keep bread & other baked goods fresh longer with this expandable, dishwasher safe bread keeper. It can expand up to 11 inches to accommodate almost any sized bread loaf.
ADJUSTABLE AIR VENTS: The bread keeper's air vents adjust to allow just the right amount of air into the storage area, & it comes with its own durable bread cutting board for convenient slicing.
MEAL PREP MADE EASY: The unit is expandable and collapses to less than half its size for easy storage. Adjustable widths accommodate baked goods of varied sizes This item is not air tight

STYLISH DESIGN & SOLID FUNCTIONALITY: Our philosophy is simple—offer stylish designs with no-nonsense functionality. We understand the kitchen is the heart of the home, where family & friends connect.
INNOVATING KITCHEN ESSENTIALS: We boast over 40 years of innovating kitchen products & housewares with unique gadgets & tools for food preparation plus thoughtfully designed food storage containers.

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More
